fields.name: AgentAuthorizationDescription
fields.fieldText: Go to (Planning & Development | Cowichan Valley Regional District) to download an Agent Authorization form. This signed document must be uploaded at the Upload Documents phase of the application.

fields.name: Description
fields.helpText: Letter of Rationale and related documents can be provided at the Upload Documents stage of the application

validationRule.errorMessage: Maximum 500 characters; additional information can be submitted at the Upload Documents stage.

screens.pausedText: Application has been paused. Click here.

screens.name: DPA_Screen
screens.label: DPA Screen
screens.pausedText: Application has been pause. Click here.

screens.name: Environment_Management_Act
screens.label: Environment Management Act

fields.name: Environment_ActDisplayTextV1
fields.fieldText: Pursuant to the Environmental Management Act, an applicant is required to submit a completed Schedule 1 Site Disclosure Statement on properties that are/were used for specified commercial or industrial purposes indicated on Schedule 2 of the Contaminated Sites Regulations.

fields.name: Environment_ActDisplayTextV2
fields.fieldText: To determine if a Schedule 1 Site Disclosure Statement is required, please indicate if:

fields.name: EnvironmentalActConditionV1
fields.fieldText: The site is or has been used for commercial or industrial purposes.

fields.name: Environment_ActDisplayTextV3
fields.fieldText:
If Yes, refer to Schedule 2 to determine if a Schedule 1 Site Disclosure Statement is required.

Refer to the Contaminated Sites Regulations, Division 3, Part 2 for a list of exemptions.

fields.name: EnvironmentalActConditionV22
fields.fieldText: A Site Disclosure Statement is required.

screens.pausedText: Application has been pause. Click here.

screens.label: Owner Details Screen

screens.name: Property_Information

screens.name: Review_Application_Screen
screens.label: Review Application Screen

fields.name: Schedule_1_review
fields.fieldText:
The site is or has been used for commercial or industrial purposes

{!EnvironmentalActConditionV1}

fields.name: Schedule_2_review
fields.fieldText:
A Site Disclosure Statement is required

{!EnvironmentalActConditionV22}

fields.name: Riparian_Area_Message_1_review
fields.fieldText:
30 metres of the high water mark of any water features

{!RiparianAreasConditionV11}

fields.name: Riparian_Area_Message_2_review
fields.fieldText:
A ravine or within 30 metres of the top of a ravine bank

{!RiparianAreasConditionV22}

screens.pausedText: Application has been pause. Click here.

screens.name: Riparian_Areas_Protection_Regulation_Declaration
screens.label: Riparian Areas Protection Regulation Declaration

fields.name: RipariaAreasDisplayTextV1
fields.fieldText: Please indicate whether the development proposal involves the removal or alteration of any vegetation; soil disturbance; construction of buildings and structures; creation of impervious or semi-impervious surfaces; trails, roads, docks, wharves, bridges and, infrastructure and works of any kind within:

fields.name: RiparianAreasConditionV11
fields.fieldText: 30 metres of the high water mark of any water features

fields.name: RiparianAreasConditionV22
fields.fieldText: A ravine or within 30 metres of the top of a ravine bank

fields.name: Riparian_AreasDisplayTextV2
fields.fieldText: Water features includes; 1) a watercourse, whether it usually contains water or not; 2) a pond, lake, river, creek, or brook; 3) a ditch, spring, or wetland that is connected by surface flow to 1 or 2 above.

fields.name: Riparian_AreasDisplayTextV3
fields.fieldText: Under the Riparian Areas Protection Act, a riparian area assessment report may be required before this application can be processed (see Riparian Areas Regulation Brochure).

screens.pausedText: Application has been pause. Click here.

fields.name: Success_Header
fields.fieldText:
Your {!RecordTypeValue}

Application has been successfully submitted


Your application will be reviewed for completeness and staff will contact you for payment.

textTemplates.name: OTPEmailTemp
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!First_Name} {!Last_Name},


Verification code: {!OTP_Value}


Thanks,

The CVRD team
